body_html:
@mkalininait

Could you please clarify how exactly this works @beanieboi?

right now we take all applications from the current season and assign them randomly to reviewers. as you mentioned, it is possible that some reviewers get more ineligible applications than others.
right now we show the reviewers all assigned application and additionally show a little icon that indicates if the application is eligible or not (see https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/710/files#diff-3a45c599b5d2df1a873ff8ddd4035a9aR18)

would you like to change that behavior? I think I read somewhere in slack that we want to assign all application because we are not sure how accurate the flags are? is that correct?
body_text:
@mkalininait

Could you please clarify how exactly this works @beanieboi?

right now we take all applications from the current season and assign them randomly to reviewers. as you mentioned, it is possible that some reviewers get more ineligible applications than others.
right now we show the reviewers all assigned application and additionally show a little icon that indicates if the application is eligible or not (see https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/710/files#diff-3a45c599b5d2df1a873ff8ddd4035a9aR18)
would you like to change that behavior? I think I read somewhere in slack that we want to assign all application because we are not sure how accurate the flags are? is that correct?
body:
@mkalininait 
> Could you please clarify how exactly this works @beanieboi?

right now we take all applications from the current season and assign them randomly to reviewers. as you mentioned, it is possible that some reviewers get more ineligible applications than others. 
right now we show the reviewers all assigned application and additionally show a little icon that indicates if the application is eligible or not (see https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/710/files#diff-3a45c599b5d2df1a873ff8ddd4035a9aR18)

would you like to change that behavior? I think I read somewhere in slack that we want to assign all application because we are not sure how accurate the flags are? is that correct?
